                         int length)
        Attempts to remove the pieces and checks for a win.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The row of the pieces to be removed.
        startIndex - The start index of the pieces to be removed.
        length - The amount of pieces to be removed.
        Returns:
        True if pieces were removed, false otherwise.
